Reviews.Content: This is a great product.  The LG was easy to install and very easy to operate.  I love the various input available. Easy to operate and install.  Great quality in the picture.

It was supposed to be a give away but it was so great that they decided to keep it for video conferencing at one of our branches.  Would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: Emily J. Anderson
Reviews.Content: This TV is great. It is just what we were looking for to replace a 20 year old Tv. Love the HD.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: deb
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd LG TV purchase, the first being a larger set for my living room 2-yrs ago.  The quality of this TV is just as impressive as the first and I would not hesitate to make another LG TV purchase when the sets in other rooms require replacement.  My experience in making this my first purchase, to include a Cheetah full motion wall mount, Mdl ALAMLB, through Amazon, for something other than e-books that is, was easy, fast, and saved me money when compared to other sites on-line or in the discount/warehouse stores.  Since that time I have made other purchases through Amazon, finding a savings of approximately $120 on one purchase alone.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased With Product
Reviews.Author: Rog
Reviews.Content: The entire purchase was a great experience.  Easy to order and arrived quickly.  The product was every thing we desired.  Easy to install and the picture and sound are great.  I have an LG flatscreen that I purchased 3 years ago that has been a great product.  This TV was an additional unit.  The new features make the product even better.  I'm sold on LG flat screens.

Reviews.Title: Value for price
Reviews.Author: Burrito Bob
Reviews.Content: We bought this as a 3rd set so the lack of features was not a hassle except for the lack of an audio out - I really need to feed "flat" flatscreen audio through an external system. But, having said that, the audio on this system is not bad - it's fuller and bassier than many flatscreens. Only 2 HDMI inputs could be a hassle for most folks, though - I mean, what would it have cost to have provided just one more...??? Anyway, for the money, if you don't need all the bells and whistles, this is not a bad set...and the pic is pretty good - again, when you take the price into account.

Reviews.Title: good

Reviews.Title: Excellent

Reviews.Title: LG 32CS560 TV

Would purchase any kind of electronics from Amazon again. Their customer service has always been so good.

Reviews.Title: Excellent

Reviews.Title: Great TV and Delivery Was Fantastic

We ordered it on Tuesday morning and it was delivered within 24 hours!!!!  We were truly amazed that Amazon was actually able to deliver this tv within 24 hrs., as promised.  TV works great and we are very happy with our purchase and service.  Mounted it on the wall with a Sony DVD player that we also purchased from Amazon at the same time and was also delivered within 24 hrs!  =)

Reviews.Title: LG 42CS560

Reviews.Content: It may not be the top of a line HDTV.  But it has a great picture and sound.  It is a good first HDTV for my mother who is 70 years old.  It was easy to set up and program.  Although it was missing an Optic Audio hookup.  But the colors where popping and she loved it.

Reviews.Title: Decent TV

Reviews.Content: We bought this for Mothers Day and it's a very nice TV.  The TV has a nice picture BUT they only thing I notice that irritates me is I notice a lot of ghosting while watch cable TV.  The speakers sound decent for a flat screen as well.

Reviews.Title: Really nice tv!

Reviews.Content: We bought this for my mother and it has a great picture and she loves it. It was also a great price for a 42" tv so we were a little concerned at first. Great sound quality as well.

Reviews.Title: Great Television!!
Reviews.Author: davd
Reviews.Content: I received my TV very fast and we are very pleased with this product. The pitcher is amazing !!!This company is very good to perches from. You will not go wrong if you get this TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy
Reviews.Author: Dog lover
Reviews.Content: This is a newer model of a tv we had already purchased so we thought it would be a good choice as we really liked the older model. This is perfect tv for a cottage. Good pic, good sound and very reasonable price

Reviews.Title: Reasonably priced and functional TV
Reviews.Author: Sol
Reviews.Content: LG 42cs 560 is a good quality TV for a reasonable price compared to others. It has a decent picture and simple features for those mostly interested in watching TV as opposed to more sophisticated Smart operations. Good bang for your buck!

Reviews.Title: So Easy
Reviews.Author: Trekalone
Reviews.Content: I just bought this for my dad. Keep in mind my dad finally threw out his old TUBE! there was something rattling in the TV (is that normal?), but everything works the way it should. I hope it last as long as his old Tube. The only down side is that it doesn't have a VGA but it does have more than enough HDMI's. Blue-ray looks awesome on this even though, dare I say ONLY 32"

Reviews.Title: Good set
Reviews.Author: Lauren Tapia
Reviews.Content: For my needs, the TV is well suited to me. I came from a 27" CRT TV that has seen better days. It is still going strong for now, and has been regulated to the bedroom as an additional TV. I purchased the 42" TV for my living room. The colors are fine, and there is sometimes a blurriness when movies seem to go "to fast" but overall, for the price, it is a decent set. The sound does need some adjusting when you first turn it on.One thing, if you have a number of items to hook up to the TV, please verify that there are enough hookups. It's not a problem currently for me, but may be in the future if I decide to add any additional items. Right now it is just hooked up to a Blu-Ray Player.No product will make everyone happy. For the price, it is great for me and am still pleased with the product.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Steven D. Grisetti
Reviews.Content: A terrific HDTV for an amazing price -- and LG dependability too! Easy to set up and adjust. Great picture. Even terrific sound.

Reviews.Title: TV for the bedroom
Reviews.Author: Gonzo Gates
Reviews.Content: Great set. Great color, great size, great HD, simple to set up and use. Fits well into the bedroom without taking up too much space. Way lighter than previous 27" CRT set.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Quality
Reviews.Author: KC Cowgirl "Amazon Devotee"
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my sister as a housewarming gift. Purchased a "used" model. Arrived promptly, well packed and "like new". Very nice quality and my sister LOVES it!

Reviews.Title: Decent - But there are better choices
Reviews.Author: LAKS "Trend Setters"
Reviews.Content: Hello All -I have been using this TV for close to two months now and here are my honest feedback on it.First of all don't just go by brand thinking LG is better than other small brands like Insignia etc.This TV has few Pros as far as I am concerned and a lot of ConsPros- PriceCons- Only three inout ports (1 AV and 2 HDMI) which is way too less when you compare the standards, my old insignia used to have 6 input ports- Buy the TV which has got 120hz refresh rate which is better than this when you are streaming online- TV stand makes the TV to be in one position and it is not easy to change directions which was very easy with my old insignia

Reviews.Title: Typical LG quality...
Reviews.Author: Adam Ruddermann
Reviews.Content: First, some perspective: I'm an extremely spoiled Panasonic plasma owner... I just didn't realize how spoiled I was.Ordered this TV because it was cheap and the reviews were decent to replace an 18" tube. I know LG's been having a lot of financial problems lately and their product quality in their appliances and electronics has gone down hill, but for $50 I took the jump. Well... now I know what happens when you skimp and go $50 less than most other higher quality TVs.Came with a clear manufacturing defect where the back panel screw holes were visible through damage to the LCD in the form of 6 perfectly placed purple dots on the screen when colors were dark. Rather than replacing my defect model I'm getting a refund and ordering a Panasonic LCD with impeccable image quality and product reviews for $50 more.Also, the color quality and overall HD quality was extremely poor. Maybe this is unreasonable given that I'm comparing it to a Panasonic plasma, but other Samsung and Panasonic LCDs that I've seen aren't so annoying to look at.PS: Mad props to Amazon for making the refund process painless. Stay awesome dudes!

Reviews.Title: Good Purchase
Reviews.Author: Amar123
Reviews.Content: I have been using this TV for past 1 week and it is pretty good. I watch movies by connecting to my laptop through HDMI cable and the video quality is awesome.

Reviews.Title: Bare Bones TV
Reviews.Author: Dale Christensen
Reviews.Content: This TV does not have any audio out jacks so there's no way to hook it into a external speaker system. Audio out is not listed in the specs but I've never seen a TV in the last 10 years that didn't have it.

Reviews.Title: No headphone jack
Reviews.Author: Shirley H. Isbill
Reviews.Content: I bought this 32" TV for bedroom use with wireless headphones.  There is no headphone jack; what looks like a headphone jack is a "service only" jack. I also have a 22" LG TV that does have a headphone jack. You have to read the fine print if you are looking for a TV for use with wireless headphones.  Toshiba does not have a headphone jack either.

Reviews.Title: Good Picture - but Unstable
Reviews.Author: ckeemery1
Reviews.Content: 37" LG CS560.  Had to return it.  Excellent Amazon service.  TV has Good picture.  However, when using Internal Antenae, no cable - just walking in the room caused marked static requiring a full minute to regain composure.  Same when just slightly touching the TV.  When hooked to cable, same problem but less sensitive than with internal antenae.  No Audio output which is a bummer.  Difficult to turn TV on and off with the remote.  This TV may just be a lemon.  May order a replacement because the Picture Quality is excellent.  Will give a follow-up review if decide for same LG replacement.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: BMW-ATL
Reviews.Content: Great buy!  Picture and sound are fantastic.  Got this for my 87 yr old mother.  She's never had a TV this big and never had HD, so she is really enjoying her TV watching now.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Joyce E. Ivory
Reviews.Content: I received this television as a Christmas gift last year Christmas 2011. When you first get it you will LOVE it. The screen quality is beautiful, the sound is perfect. There are various options to choose from for different programs, if you are watching movies or sports you can set the screen for enhancement. BUT then the television for no apparent reason starts to turn itself off. It's a constant ANNOYING problem, because once it turns itself off, it turns itself back on again, and then off in about 3 seconds. It continues doing that in a loop until finally it turns itself off and stays off. The remote won't work to turn it back on nor will the button on the side of the TV. You have to unplug it from the wall and then MAYBE it will turn back on, and if it does turn back on it will stay on for a while and then begin to turn itself off again. It first started happening about seven months after I had it when I watched a Netflix movie on the TV. It stopped right in the middle of the movie. I ended up taking it to a repair shop and they took the dongle off of it, and it began working fine. No I don't have warranty papers or anything because my sister gave it to me as a gift and didn't keep the receipts or anything oops. Doesn't matter though because all of the people online who have warranties said they are ignored by LG, speak to rude representatives, and/or have a huge problem getting any assistance. Some have been placed on a repair person waiting list for months. Anyway that  removal of dongle fix lasted for about a month, so of course I thought it was the dongle causing the problem. Then I decided to hook up my Xbox to the TV. MISTAKE! I didn't even play a game I watched a movie one day and it was fine, a couple of days later I watched another movie on Xbox and now the TV is turning on and off again. Yes I unhooked the Xbox, but I am still having the problem...It's just my TV you say... I have a lemon... well when I went to check online for help there were over THREE THOUSAND complaints about the same issue with this television. Once again, I warn you DO NOT BUY THIS TV!!! Although I received this TV as a gift I will NEVER buy an LG product EVER! I'm just going to end up putting this TV in the other room and go back to my non HD Sony TV that I've had for more than ten years. Still working and in GREAT condition or go buy a Sony or another good brand of HD television. Sometimes you just have to pay more to get more.

Reviews.Title: Don't do 60HZ
Reviews.Author: dante
Reviews.Content: The size is great - not too big but better than what I had.  Don't get 60 HZ - I should have saved up more money and went for a 120HZ.  Scrolling news on ESPN is blurry!

Reviews.Title: Image sticking after just a few seconds
Reviews.Author: Silea
Reviews.Content: This TV is basically unwatchable. If the picture on the screen is still for just a few seconds, it 'sticks'. So at the end of a commercial, when they show the company logo for 5 seconds, we get to keep seeing the logo for the next two minutes, faint but entirely visible, behind whatever comes next.We've tried just about every setting, even turning the brightness way way down, but nothing helps. LG tech support was useless, suggesting we change settings that weren't wrong in the first place.

Reviews.Title: Good TV worth the price
Reviews.Author: MikeCon
Reviews.Content: Nice size for a small living room or family room. I got what I was expecting...I would recommend this TV, if you are looking for a nice medium size.

Reviews.Title: super picture
Reviews.Author: Robert Mount
Reviews.Content: Wanted to go HD in the bedroom, at a reasonable price, and stay with name brand. The LG fit the bill perfectly. Only problem I had was it does not have a external audio plug for my head phones. Solved by plugging into xfinity box.

Reviews.Title: Reccomend this LG tv.
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: I already have the same tv for over a year and it is great that is why I bought the same set for another room.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my needs
Reviews.Author: Durt
Reviews.Content: I'm a video editor & needed a nice monitor for clients to watch. I Initially bought an off, off brand to keep the cost down, but it was such a piece of junk I decided to step up to a brand name & bought the 32" LG used through Amazon Warehouse Deals. It was in as-new condition and the picture is fantastic. I also own a 42" LG, so I already knew how to adjust the picture, which is a pretty extensive menu. I run amplified sound through my editing system, so I can't speak to the TV's audio - but I have yet to hear any flat screen TV with acceptable sound. I'd just count on having to run audio through an external amp of some sort. But the picture of this set is just terrific. Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: Damo
Reviews.Content: I wanted a new TV for my parents that would be easy for them to operate.  For the most part this TV fits that criteria.  It was up and running out of the box in minutes. There were only two problems I noticed. One, and I knew this before I bought it, there is only one set of component plugs.  This means that they had to forsake their older DVD player for the Wii that they use when their grandchildren visit.  I have thought about buying a new blueray which can be plugged into the HDMI port, but that will have to be for another time.  The second is that  was that one of the reasons I got it was the feature that supposedly brings balance between dialogue and background (if you ever watched a new movie on an old TV you will notice that the dialogue can be drowned out by background noise and music).  This doesn't work as well as I thought it would, but my parents feel it is a great improvement over their old tube TV.There is no audio out, so the speakers will have to be good enough, and they are.  The volume has never gone above "10" and even at 10 it was pretty loud and still clear.  I don't know what "10" is out of, but the audio display bar is barely a quarter of the way when it is on 10.If getting a TV for normal cable and over the air stations, with the occasional DVD is what you want, then this is perfect. Lightweight, thin, good picture, and audio.  The Wii played spectacularly on it, but if you are a hardcore gamer or picky about audio/video, this may not be for you.

Reviews.Title: it's a tv...
Reviews.Author: Randy johnson
Reviews.Content: I gave it a three, only because it works,BUT the product was mis represented!!!!!!!!!!!!!!There are not enough av connections, and no head-phone jack!!!!!!the pictures don't clearly show this...I was going to ship it back and find something else, BUT it would have cost me more than I was willing to pay....

Reviews.Title: This TV doesn't have audio output
Reviews.Author: MANE
Reviews.Content: This TV doesn't have audio output. I did'nt like that becouse I can't conenct my TV to an auxiliary. The other connectivities are right.

Reviews.Title: Good, but not excellent
Reviews.Author: Angela
Reviews.Content: The TV is OK. But I find the sound is not very clear and the color of the screen is a bit grey. Since I don't watch TV a lot, so far I can accept it.

Reviews.Title: LG tv
Reviews.Author: Patricia Langford
Reviews.Content: Fantastic picture! Quick delivery by Amazon, as usual. Very pleased with TV. Easy to set up, great picture, and good sound quality. Would definitely purchase LG again, and from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: wonderful picture
Reviews.Author: F. A. Canavan "AnnapolisGrad"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV based on Consumer Report info...it has a wonderful picture and great sound.  The size is great for a dorm room or small den.

Reviews.Title: Love this Television
Reviews.Author: S. Kobs "Amazon Lover"
Reviews.Content: We received this television set much quicker than expected and we really love the quality of the picture and the sound.

Reviews.Title: Tip Top TV
Reviews.Author: Teresa Ashley
Reviews.Content: Arrived early. Easy to set up. Beautiful picture. Sounds Great. Happy with product and hope it lasts for a long long time.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointged with this LG T.V. Would not recommend it to anyone.
Reviews.Author: Gene R. DeBarr
Reviews.Content: Very disapointed at spending all this money for a L.G.37" HD TV to replace the 32" "cheaper T.V." that came with the unit. The cheaper t.v. allowed us to play the audio from the t.v. thru the two large experior speakers in the trailer. Due to the poor sound quality of these flat screen t.v. with the small speaker that most have, the exterior speakers were a "godsend" in hearing for us.  We just assumed that this larger and more expensive t.v. would have had the audio outputs but it didn't. Amazon description of the t.v. did not give enough information about the connections on it. We have a 42" H.D. flatscreen LG t.v. as our main t.v. in our family room and it had audio inputs. I hold amazon as much responsible for this for not giving or stating enough tech. information for this tv.An unhappy amazon customer,.

Reviews.Title: It's Great!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Norma
Reviews.Content: We are very Happy with this TV.  I rated it 5 star because the picture is great. I love the way the HD is . This is our first flat screen tv and we are very please with this one.I will recommend this tv to everyone.  We were in Fla. for vacation and this is the kind of tv that was in our room and we liked it, so much that  we brought a LG tv.

Reviews.Title: LG scores again with 32-inch 1080p HDTV
Reviews.Author: 1truegritter
Reviews.Content: Right out of the box this was a great buy. It took me maybe five minutes to assemble and hook it up. All I needed was to borrow the neighbors phillips-head screwdriver. The set has four screws for the attaching the flat panel to the base, and it wasn't all that difficult, once I put on my reading glasses and opened the instruction manual. I have Charter cable, which plugged into the back with ease. The original settings were good, but I was able to redefine the overall settings, picture size, sound quality, etc. and the customized settings are great. I also plugged in my HDMI cable and watched Harry Potter DVDs the first night with no problem at all. The only issue I've had with the set is not being able to use an external sound system. I have difficulty hearing some sounds. I bought a set of headphones with a wireless tower that is supposed to plug into the headphone plug on the LG. It doesn't work. I still haven't been able to figure it out. If anyone else has solved this problem, let me know.  All in all, I'd recommend this HDTV without reservation. This picture quality alone (1080p) is brilliant. The 32-inch size is just right for a small apartment or large den. The ease of use with the remote is great and the function panel is easy to access and adjust. Get one and begin enjoying television again.

Reviews.Title: LG TV
Reviews.Author: COOL 56ER
Reviews.Content: THE TV WAS RECEIVED IN DEFECTIVE CONDITION.TV WOULD TURN ITSELF ON AND OFF AND TV STAND WAS NOT ALLIGNED CORECTLY TO FIT TV.

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: Had it for a few days now no issues with pic or audio quality. Movies I play thru my ps3 bluray player work just great.

Reviews.Title: A word of caution with LG
Reviews.Author: Daniel Shea
Reviews.Content: I bought an LG 32" HDTV awhile back and I liked it for what it was, but then it had a screen flickering issue in regards to the brightness constantly dimming. Luckily I had an extended warranty and I got a replacement 32" LG HDTV because the motherboard, or whatever they call it for these tvs, was defective and it would have cost too much to repair so it was more logical for me to get the replacement. So I got the replacement. Had it for about 2 years then there was problems with the HDMI input in regards to the screen being faulty and the signal cutting out. This tv I didn't have an extended warranty for and the basic warranty was out. That's 2 of these 32" LG HDTVs I've had with a similar issue with their internal components. A lot of these reviews you'll read are on immediate impressions, but I am here to mention my longer term impressions with LG. And sadly they don't meet my long term expectations. And it's a shame I have to chuck these tvs out after not even five years of moderate use just because of minor issues. But if you want a television that will last you longer then look elsewhere. Because odds are soon after the standard warranty is up you will encounter problems with your tv and will be stuck looking for a new one.

Reviews.Title: Bad Experience with LG TVs
Reviews.Author: CM
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend LG TVs based on my experience as mine have not been reliable. I have owned 3 of them, two 42" and one 32", all of which went on the blink within 2 years or less. The first 42" would not power on at all and needed a new main board at a cost of $600 (TV repaired at an LG authorized facility but even after $600 it was returned with a tuner/sound problem). A second 42" purchased some months later went black (would produce sound but no picture) and the third, a 32", started powering on and off by itself for no reason when changing channels and became unwatchable. I talked to LG about my bad experience but to no avail; they offered no help. The last two TVs went to the recycler as the cost to repair them was over half of new ones.

Reviews.Title: terrible experience, OK TV
Reviews.Author: Kymra A. Kurinskas
Reviews.Content: I've bought A LOT of stuff from Amazon, and have never had an issue.  This TV however, has been a problem from the start.I ordered the TV on Sunday night looking to replace an older LG that I loved.  I was going down from a 120GHz to the 60GHZ as I rarely used it on my previous set, even when gaming.  I was a little nervous about this, but I knew I could return it if I was not happy.Prime let me send it overnight to be here on Tuesday for $3.99, but on Tuesday morning the UPS website indicated it would not be here until Wednesday.  I called customer service and they apologized and refunded my $3.99 shiping.  I considered canceling the order and buying the TV at the local Walmart, but decided to wait one day even though CS told me I could cancel the order right then.On Wednesday the TV came, and had a completely smashed screen.  I called CS again, and they indicatd they would send out a replacement, and a UPS driver with a slip to pick up the broken set with 1-5 days.  I called back an hour later to just cancel the order, but they told me I had to refuse delivery instead.  That seemed weird because they could have cancelled it on the truck the day before.  I then noticed it was being sold for $50 cheaper than when I bought it, so they refunded me the $50 due to the low price guarantee.So, the TV finally came on Thursday, and the broken set was also picked up later that day.  The TV is OK, but it's a lot cheaper build that their previous sets.  Even the menu graphics look cheaper.  It could just be a more basic model, and it seems fine for the $, but I'm not impressed by it.  I do notice the lack of the 120GHZ refresh rate when plaing my PS3 a little bit.Customer service was good, but I'll NEVER buy a TV from Amazon or online again.

Reviews.Title: INSTALLATION NIGHTMARE
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: The installation to my TV took five hours.The TV is an LG 42" LED LCD.The centers for the mounting holes are on 8.0" centers.This does not match up with ANY of the mounting slots on the mount.So, I had to go to the hardare store, and buy a 1/4" drill bit that could drill the holes in the steel plate.
